backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining types, admin authentication with password and access control, visitor stats, site content management, and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented frontend files, components, and requirements for public dashboard rendering and in‑page navigation.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide explaining how to deploy the app to the IC mainnet with environment configuration steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, light and dark mode tokens, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, favicon, preload assets, and mounting the React root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routing, error boundary, layout, admin dashboard routes, and profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Component showing an access denied message with optional admin initialization error and actions for logout or returning home.
frontend/src/components/CustomerForm.tsx: Customer form component handling input fields, validation, file uploads with progress, and submission via mutation.
frontend/src/components/DashboardFilters: Provides search, insurance-type filter, and sort controls for dashboard data.
Renders the admin dashboard header with branding, user profile display, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/DashboardStats.t: Calculates and displays statistics such as total submissions, today’s count, recent activity, and most popular insurance type.
frontend/src/components/DashboardTable.t: Displays customer submissions in a scrollable table with details, insurance badges, and document download/view actions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing branding, contact info, office hours, and app settings-driven fields.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with branding, navigation links, maintenance alert, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section that loads dynamic text and image, plus action buttons and stats grid.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Administrator profile setup dialog with validation, save mutation, and success state.
frontend/src/components/PublicSubmission: Wrapper section that displays the submissions dashboard with a heading.
frontend/src/components/Services.tsx: Services section rendering static or dynamic insurance services with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/SubmissionsDashb: Dashboard listing customer submissions with search, filtering, sorting, and backend health/error handling.
frontend/src/components/SupportSection.t: Support section showing contact options, email, phone, and office hours from app settings.
frontend/src/constants/branding.ts: Defines centralized branding info including logo paths, company details, and contact information.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealth.ts: Checks backend availability by calling a public query and exposes health status with auto‑refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identities, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend queries and mutations with health-aware logic, providing admin, profile, and form operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind setup and brand-specific CSS variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardL: Admin dashboard layout checking auth/admin status, rendering navigation tabs, and showing nested routes.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ContentPage.tsx: Admin page for editing site content with image upload, form fields, and save functionality.
frontend/src/pages/admin/SettingsPage.ts: Admin interface to view and update global application settings such as maintenance mode and contact info.
frontend/src/pages/admin/SubmissionsPage: Renders the submissions dashboard component with a title.
frontend/src/pages/admin/UsersPage.tsx: Admin page listing user profiles and providing a dialog to edit user details.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Implements admin login flow using Internet Identity and password validation with health and admin checks.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the public homepage with header, hero, services, submissions, form, and footer components.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrorMapping.t: Utilities to categorize backend errors, extract trap messages, and generate user‑friendly error text.
frontend/src/utils/logOnce.ts: Utility to log specific errors only once and manage logged‑error state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routes), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom theme colors, container settings, plugins, and brand color variables.
project_state.json: Captures the project’s current state, features, and requests related to showing the admin dashboard on the public homepage.
